issue.title: www.bild.de
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.10.1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.bild.de/unterhaltung/tv/tv/netflix-top-10-die-zehn-beliebtesten-filme-serien-fuers-wochenende-80640222.bild.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track header, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Disable cache for third-party requests

### Add your comment and screenshots


AdGuard Tracking filter prevent enable external content. Click on "Externen Inhalt aktivieren" does nothing.

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![bild1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6276915/178076901-273304ea-a1e9-4292-a68c-2fafbbebb85e.png)


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![bild2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6276915/178076926-26445e91-790c-4e7c-b059-b65f59c5481b.png)


</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: m.blog.daum.net

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.blog.daum.net/dltmdal19/16308189, https://namu.wiki/w/굽네치킨

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, EasyList, List-KR, YousList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
AdGuard is detected by Kakao TV videos attached to other sites. Below is the HTML tag of the Kakao TV video on the webpage.
<figure
  data-ke-type="video" 
  data-ke-style="alignLeft" 
  data-video-host="kakaotv" 
  data-video-url="https://kakaotv.daum.net/embed/player/cliplink/op6_WJCF_Ns%24@my?service=daum_blog" 
  data-video-thumbnail="http://cfs5.flvs.daum.net/files/50/25/21/89/31507274/thumb.jpg" 
  data-video-play-service="daum_blog" 
  data-video-width="640" 
  data-video-height="360">
  <iframe src="https://kakaotv.daum.net/embed/player/cliplink/op6_WJCF_Ns%24@my?service=daum_blog" width="640" height="360" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
<figcaption></figcaption>

Same thing happens with namu.wiki.

<iframe class='wiki-media' allowfullscreen='' width='640' height='360' frameborder='0' src='//tv.kakao.com/embed/player/cliplink/381281640' loading='lazy' data-v-e45978b7></iframe>

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

[![3-E42-A9-DB-AFEA-4-AA9-A1-EB-EA68-B524-C598.png](https://i.postimg.cc/L8M1NMjG/3-E42-A9-DB-AFEA-4-AA9-A1-EB-EA68-B524-C598.png)](https://postimg.cc/0bcjyFWC)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

[![DEDD16-DD-A10-A-4916-B39-D-24-FCC50619-D3.png](https://i.postimg.cc/7Pd7JzhH/DEDD16-DD-A10-A-4916-B39-D-24-FCC50619-D3.png)](https://postimg.cc/DmQmt81H)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
